name: interruptionNotification
desc: A notification the system posts when an audio interruption occurs.

items.name: let AVAudioSessionInterruptionTypeKey: String
items.desc: A user info key to retrieve the interruption type.

items.name: let AVAudioSessionInterruptionOptionKey: String
items.desc: A user info key to retrieve the interruption option.

items.name: let AVAudioSessionInterruptionReasonKey: String
items.desc: A user info key to retrieve the interruption reason.

items.name: let AVAudioSessionInterruptionWasSuspendedKey: String
items.desc: A user info key used to determine if the interruption is due to the audio session being deactivated when the system suspended the app.

items.name: enum AVAudioSession.InterruptionType
items.desc: Constants that describe the type of an audio interruption.

items.name: struct AVAudioSession.InterruptionOptions
items.desc: Constants that indicate the state of an audio session after an interruption.

items.name: enum AVAudioSession.InterruptionReason
items.desc: Constants that define the reasons for an audio session interruption.
